body_html:
Hi @yongtang Yes, bazel upgrade needs more changes internally.

However, for us to be able to use a feature only in 0.17.1, we have to bump our requirement of bazel version to 0.17.1
I would like to wait one full bazel release cycle before I do that, as pushing dependencies to bleeding edge has caused problems before.
Does this sound reasonable?

body:
Hi @yongtang Yes, bazel upgrade needs more changes internally.

However, for us to be able to use a feature only in 0.17.1, we have to bump our requirement of bazel version to 0.17.1
I would like to wait one full bazel release cycle before I do that, as pushing dependencies to bleeding edge has caused problems before.
Does this sound reasonable?
